item.title: Raspberrypi Syncthing
item.description: UPDATE: raspberrypi and syncthing are not used any more. sudo apt install syncthing sudo systemctl enable syncthing@pi sudo systemctl start sycnthing@pi Autostart: https://docs.syncthing.net/users/autostart.html#linux NFS share is enabled on router. Then syncthing on raspberrypi could store the files from phones/PCs to the usb drive.
